citation.title: Public–private partnerships in addressing counterfeit medicines: The development of the Partnership for Safe Medicines and the Partnership for Safe Medicines-India

news.title: Nonprofit Working To Block Drug Imports Has Ties To Pharma Lobby
news.summary: An organization campaigning against foreign drug imports has deep connections to the lobbying group PhRMA, which includes Eli Lilly, Pfizer and Bayer.

blogs.title: Nonprofit Working To Block Drug Imports Has Ties To Pharma Lobby
blogs.summary: An organization campaigning against foreign drug imports has deep connections to the lobbying group PhRMA, which includes Eli Lilly, Pfizer and Bayer, an analysis by Kaiser Health News reveals.(Image credit: Bill Diodato/Getty Images)
